meanings.definition: The quality or state of being cheerful.
meanings.sent2: I admire her cheerfulness even in tough times.
meanings.sent3: His constant cheerfulness can be contagious.
meanings.sent4: The cheerfulness in her voice was like a ray of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The cheerfulness of the children playing was a joy to behold.

meanings.sent1: His cheerfulness always brings a smile to my face.
meanings.sent2: She exudes cheerfulness wherever she goes.
meanings.sent3: The dog's tail wagging showed its cheerfulness.
meanings.sent4: Her cheerfulness was a beacon of hope in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The cheerfulness in his eyes was infectious to everyone around him.
